"Octopus Adaptability Challenge": Create a game where participants must adapt to limited resources and overcome challenges similar to those faced by an octopus with only seven arms.
"Bird Flight Challenge": Create a physical challenge where participants attempt to fly like birds without wings, emphasizing the importance of balance and posture.
"Fish Swimming Challenge": Create a physical challenge where participants attempt to swim like fish, emphasizing the importance of streamlined body shape and efficient movement.
